mapper.update:
UPDATE T_FAULT_TRACK SET
COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode},
COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName},
FAULT_ANALYSIS_NO = #{faultAnalysisNo},
TRACK_REASON = #{trackReason},
TRACK_USER_ID = #{trackUserId},
TRACK_TIME = #{trackTime},
TRACK_PERIOD = #{trackPeriod},
TRACK_CYCLE = #{trackCycle},
TRACK_REPORTER_ID = #{trackReporterId},
TRACK_START_DATE = #{trackStartDate},
TRACK_END_DATE = #{trackEndDate},
TRACK_REPORT_TIME = #{trackReportTime},
TRACK_RESULT = #{trackResult},
TRACK_CLOSER_ID = #{trackCloserId},
TRACK_CLOSE_TIME = #{trackCloseTime},
WORK_FLOW_INST_ID = #{workFlowInstId},
WORK_FLOW_INST_STATUS = #{workFlowInstStatus},
DOC_ID = #{docId},
REMARK = #{remark},
REC_CREATOR = #{recCreator},
REC_CREATE_TIME = #{recCreateTime},
REC_REVISOR = #{recRevisor},
REC_REVISE_TIME = #{recReviseTime},
REC_DELETOR = #{recDeletor},
REC_DELETE_TIME = #{recDeleteTime},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
ARCHIVE_FLAG = #{archiveFlag},
REC_STATUS = #{recStatus},
EXT1 = #{ext1},
EXT2 = #{ext2},
EXT3 = #{ext3},
EXT4 = #{ext4},
EXT5 = #{ext5},
WHERE FAULT_TRACK_NO = #{faultTrackNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT df11.REC_ID as "recId", df11.COMPANY_CODE as "companyCode", df11.COMPANY_NAME as "companyName", df11.FAULT_TRACK_NO as "faultTrackNo", df11.FAULT_TRACK_WORK_NO as "faultTrackWorkNo", df11.DISPATCH_USER_ID as "dispatchUserId", df11.DISPATCH_TIME as "dispatchTime", df11.WORKER_GROUP_CODE as "workerGroupCode", df11.WORK_GROUP_NAME as "workGroupName", df11.TRACK_REPORTER_ID as "trackReporterId", df11.TRACK_REPORT_TIME as "trackReportTime", (Select u.USER_NAME from IPLAT60.c u where u.LOGIN_NAME =df11.TRACK_REPORTER_ID) as "trackReportName", (Select u.USER_NAME from IPLAT60.XS_USER u where u.LOGIN_NAME = df11.DISPATCH_USER_ID) as "dispatchUserName", (Select u.USER_NAME from IPLAT60.XS_USER u where u.LOGIN_NAME = df11.TRACK_CLOSER_ID) as "trackCloserName", df11.TRACK_RESULT as "trackResult", df11.TRACK_CLOSER_ID as "trackCloserId", df11.TRACK_CLOSE_TIME as "trackCloseTime", df11.DOC_ID as "docId", df11.REMARK as "remark", df11.REC_CREATOR as "recCreator", df11.REC_CREATE_TIME as "recCreateTime", df11.REC_REVISOR as "recRevisor", df11.REC_REVISE_TIME as "recReviseTime", df11.REC_DELETOR as "recDeletor", df11.REC_DELETE_TIME as "recDeleteTime", df11.DELETE_FLAG as "deleteFlag", df11.ARCHIVE_FLAG as "archiveFlag", df11.REC_STATUS as "recStatus", df1.OBJECT_CODE as "objectCode", df1.OBJECT_NAME as "objectName" FROM T_FAULT_TRACK_DETAIL df11 LEFT JOIN T_FAULT_TRACK df9 ON df11.FAULT_TRACK_NO = df9.FAULT_TRACK_NO LEFT JOIN T_FAULT_ORDER df2 ON df9.FAULT_WORK_NO = df2.FAULT_WORK_NO LEFT JOIN T_FAULT_INFO df1 ON df9.FAULT_NO = df1.FAULT_NO AND df2.FAULT_NO = df1.FAULT_NO
and df11.REC_ID = #{id}

SELECT df1.FAULT_NO AS "faultNo", df2.FAULT_WORK_NO AS "faultWorkNo", df1.OBJECT_CODE AS "objectCode", df1.OBJECT_NAME AS "objectName", df1.DISCOVERY_TIME AS "discoveryTime", df1.FAULT_DISPLAY_DETAIL AS "faultDisplayDetail", df2.FAULT_REASON_DETAIL AS "faultReasonDetail", df2.FAULT_ACTION_DETAIL AS "faultActionDetail", df1.FAULT_MODULE AS "faultModule", df1.LINE_CODE AS "lineCode", df1.POSITION_CODE AS "positionCode" FROM T_FAULT_ORDER df2, T_FAULT_INFO df1 WHERE df1.FAULT_NO = df2.FAULT_NO
df2.FAULT_WORK_NO =#{faultWorkNo}
